Name:
USS Thomas
HMS St Albans
HNoMS St Albans
Dostoyny (Worthy)
Builder: Newport News Shipbuilding and Dry Dock Company
Fate:
Transferred to United Kingdom, 23 September 1940
Transferred to Royal Norwegian Navy in April 1941
Returned to United Kingdom, 4 May 1944[1]
Transferred to UK for scrapping, 28 February 1949
Armament:
Initial

4 × 4 in (102 mm)/50 guns
1 x 3 in (76 mm)/23 gun
12 x 21 inch (533 mm) torpedo tubes 

1941–44

3 × 4 in (102 mm) guns
2 x 3 in (76 mm) guns
4 DC throwers[1]
